column5: ~~~Had my brother up from Kentucky,visiting the family, so we decided to head out on Simcoe, from Pephpherlaw to catch some Perch  At least that was the plan, I started off with the first Jumbo of the day,  I was holding it away back from the camera that why it looks so small, we hit 4 spots with 2 holding Bait balls, then it went dead not a mark on the screen, so we decided to move and then WHAM brother says PHISH ON, and it an;t no Perch. here the Video I took  He drove over 11hrs. to get to  my place, and how was his Phishen trip.
Great video oldphart!!! Glad your brother had a good time.
that's a big cat for simcoe
Nice cat...  I have yet to get a cat I've 2lbs...  Looks like a fun day...
Look at the smile on your brothers face!!!Priceless.Im grinning ear to ear, just looking at the pic.  Thanks for the smile
And who says there aren't any sharks in Ontario, look at that monster you caught!!!
Nice Kitty Here's my favorite Kitty
I've got a new ram-mount for you lowrance gps if you're interested...  $20 It's brand new... PM me if you're interested...  Looks like a good time was had by all...
Congrats to your bro for catching a Lake Simcoe Mountain Trout...
Nice to see the smiles.  Where in  Kentucky is he from?
